### parseAlignment() {#a352f4ca101ae014677dda708b07b98f7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Error parseAlignment (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> &amp; Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, bool AllowZero=false)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Attempts to parse an alignment component of a specification.

On success, returns the value converted to byte amount in <code>Alignment</code>. If the value is zero and <code>AllowZero</code> is true, <code>Alignment</code> is set to one.

Return an error in a number of cases:
<ul>
<li><code>Str</code> is empty or contains characters other than decimal digits;</li>
<li>the value is zero and <code>AllowZero</code> is false;</li>
<li>the value is too large;</li>
<li>the value is not a multiple of the byte width;</li>
<li>the value converted to byte amount is not not a power of two.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00310">310</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/datalayout-cpp">DataLayout.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Support for StructLayout</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">StructLayout::StructLayout(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structtype">StructType</a> &#42;ST, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">    : StructSize(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a>::getFixed(0)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;isOpaque() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot get layout of opaque structs&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">  IsPadded = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">  NumElements = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loop over each of the elements, placing them in memory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = NumElements; i != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a92f4283d4e0e2ea1776894b3ae93640f">e</a>; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;getElementType(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (i == 0 &amp;&amp; Ty-&gt;isScalableTy())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">      StructSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a5fd620f2446d1a4cb0d55a12d182bb34">TypeSize::getScalable</a>(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> TyAlign = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;isPacked() ? <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1) : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getABITypeAlign(Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add padding if necessary to align the data element properly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently the only structure with scalable size will be the homogeneous</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalable vector types. Homogeneous scalable vector types have members of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same data type so no alignment issue will happen. The condition here</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// assumes so and needs to be adjusted if this assumption changes (e.g. we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// support structures with arbitrary scalable data type, or structure that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contains both fixed size and scalable size data type members).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!StructSize.isScalable() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(TyAlign, StructSize)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">      IsPadded = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">      StructSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a003b4369b4130e669dc9139798e0193c">TypeSize::getFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(StructSize, TyAlign));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep track of maximum alignment constraint.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">    StructAlignment = std::max(TyAlign, StructAlignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    getMemberOffsets()&#91;i&#93; = StructSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Consume space for this data item</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    StructSize += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add padding to the end of the struct so that it could be put in an array</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and all array elements would be aligned correctly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!StructSize.isScalable() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(StructAlignment, StructSize)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">    IsPadded = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">    StructSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a003b4369b4130e669dc9139798e0193c">TypeSize::getFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(StructSize, StructAlignment));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// getElementContainingOffset - Given a valid offset into the structure,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot get element at offset for structure containing scalable &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a003b4369b4130e669dc9139798e0193c">TypeSize::getFixed</a>(FixedOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::upper&#95;bound(MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>(), MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">      (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> + 1 == MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#addaa86bfa4ca26b7f366cbdd868f99bf">TypeSize::isKnownGT</a>(&#42;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> + 1), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Upper bound didn&#39;t work!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Multiple fields can have the same offset if any of them are zero sized.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, in &#123; i32, &#91;0 x i32&#93;, i32 &#125;, searching for offset 4 will stop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at the i32 element, because it is the last element at that offset.  This is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the right one to return, because anything after it will have a higher</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offset, implying that this element is non-empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> - MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Attempts to parse an alignment component of a specification.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment">/// On success, returns the value converted to byte amount in \\p Alignment.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the value is zero and \\p AllowZero is true, \\p Alignment is set to one.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return an error in a number of cases:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - \\p Str is empty or contains characters other than decimal digits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - the value is zero and \\p AllowZero is false;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - the value is too large;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - the value is not a multiple of the byte width;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - the value converted to byte amount is not not a power of two.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310" lineLink="#a352f4ca101ae014677dda708b07b98f7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="#a352f4ca101ae014677dda708b07b98f7">parseAlignment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> &amp;Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllowZero = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Str.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(Name + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; alignment component cannot be empty&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we still couldn&#39;t find a reasonable default alignment, fall back</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to a simple heuristic that the alignment is the first power of two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// greater-or-equal to the store size of the type.  This is a reasonable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// approximation of reality, and if the user wanted something less</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// less conservative, they should have specified it explicitly in the data</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// layout.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> / 8));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> abi&#95;or&#95;pref ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;ABIAlign : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;PrefAlign;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By default, use natural alignment for vector types. This is consistent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with what clang and llvm-gcc do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;re only calculating a natural alignment, so it doesn&#39;t have to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// based on the full size for scalable vectors. Using the minimum element</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// count should be enough here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
